properties.description: Post deployment script to create lake databases

source:
from odw.core.util.util import Util
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=Util.get_storage_account()

logging_database_location = f"abfss://logging@{storage_account}"
standardised_database_location = f"abfss://odw-standardised@{storage_account}"
harmonised_database_location = f"abfss://odw-harmonised@{storage_account}"
curated_database_location = f"abfss://odw-curated@{storage_account}"
curated_migration_database_location = f"abfss://odw-curated-migration@{storage_account}"
config_database_location = f"abfss://odw-config-db@{storage_account}"

spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS logging LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_standardised_db LOCATION '{standardised_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db LOCATION '{harmonised_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db LOCATION '{curated_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_migration_db LOCATION '{curated_migration_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS config LOCATION '{config_database_location}'")
